column4: hello guys....just read about Xubuntu and wanted to take a look at it...followed the instructions on https://wiki.ubuntu.com/InstallingXubuntu, but it said   E: Couldn't find package xubuntu-desktop
its in universe reposiroty
did you run apt-get update after?
there you go... you are on hoary, it only exists for breezy, you'll need to upgrade first
bingo....didn't say about that...damn...any way to upgrade to breeze without downloading the iso? i don't have a change to buy the distrib of breezy...live in ukraine
were in a free software paradise.......
you change all occurrences of hoary to breezy in your sources.list, then apt-get update
then you sudo apt-get -f install  just to be sure, then you sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
what is your gfx card?
ok so not nvidia or ati then ? its fine ;)
thanx...doing as you instructed just now...
hehe good luck ;)
what is your pc? processor & ram?
celeron 2.0, 256 ram, don't remember the intel chipset for it
after which command?
noOOO;  just " sudo apt-get -f install  "
ok i just run: sudo apt-get -f install...got Reading package lists... Done
ok, now sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
hehe upgraaaaaaaade
thanks a bunch...
if you did the make,  make install thing to install it, then you to the tarball directory and try sudo make uninstall
6.4 you mean? dapepr? yup :]
working nice?
working? hehe sort of :)
